text: Love & Anarchy (Swedish: Kärlek & Anarki) is an upcoming romantic comedy TV series. It is Netflix's second Swedish-language TV series, following Quicksand. It is produced by the same company, FLX. The series was created by Lisa Langseth, who also serves as head writer together with Alex Haridi. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2020s Swedish television series Category:2020s romantic comedy television series Category:Lisa Langseth Category:Upcoming Netflix original programming Category:Swedish-language Netflix original programming
title: Love & Anarchy (TV series)
